person.persName: Robert D. Mahone (Lexington, Kentucky, merchant and tailor)

body.p: Lexington, Kentucky, merchant and tailor. Virginia native. Married to Frances A. Mahone. Father of Samuel Mahone and William R. Mahone. Merchant and tailor in Lexington in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons, hiring one enslaved person out to William Milton, in 1860.
